data.title: Zimbra Collaboration Suite Feature List
data.meta_description: Zimbra Collaboration Suite Feature List - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. This document provides a feature list for Zimbra Collaboration Suite 6.0. It includes over 50 features organized into categories like Web Collaboration, Cross-Application Features, and Mail. Some key features mentioned are an AJAX-based web interface, drag and drop functionality, spell checking, sharing of contacts and calendars, and conversations view for grouping email threads across folders. The document also indicates whether each feature is available in the Open Source (O), Premium (S), Appliance (A), or Partner (P) editions.
